structure.unit: SANITARIANS, WATER PLANT OPERATORS, AND WATER WELL CONSTRUCTION PRACTICES

law.text: The secretary, upon recommendation of the board, shall promulgate administrative regulations establishing standards of practice for water well construction. The secretary shall utilize the manual of water well construction practices as the guidance document in the development of standards and regulations. These standards and regulations shall be proposed within one (1) year of July 13, 1984, and shall be included as a component of the certification program.
law.history: Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 215, sec. 8, effective July 13, 1984.
